QuestData.Title: The Troll Incursion
QuestData.Description: A group of trolls, claiming to represent the Darkspear tribe, have arrived at Stormwind Harbor. Our guards are keeping them at bay, for now.$b$bThe Stormwind Harbor Guards are seeking seasoned adventurers for help in removing the trolls from the harbor. Report to Commander Sharp at Stormwind Harbor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Commander Sharp in Stormwind Harbor.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh good, a $c. Maybe you'll have better luck in dealing with these trolls.$b$bSee what they want and then try to get rid of them.
